name: Energy Drink
function: Instantly restores all your personal energy.

name: EScooter Battery Pack
function: Instantly fully recharges your e-scooter battery, but you must be near the scooter.

name: Ice Pack
function: Instantly sets a selected insulated-bag compartment to 0°C; consumes one pack.

name: Heat Pack
function: Instantly sets a selected insulated-bag compartment to 60°C; consumes one pack.
